duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide onsite in-person tax preparation, support, and guidance to tax filers.
Coordinate tax site operations, including scheduling and maintaining appointment schedules.
Ensure adequate coverage, supplies, forms, and equipment are maintained at tax site.
Maintain organized records of tax returns prepared at the tax sites.
Participate in outreach efforts and appointment scheduling for clients of the free tax preparation program.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Finance or Business (required)
